# putio Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "putio" {
  putio_oauth_token = "..."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `oauth_token` (String, Sensitive) Put.io OAuth token. Get one here https://app.put.io/account/api.
